source:
temp = pd.DataFrame([cld3.get_language(i) for i in sellers])

# select those that we're sure about the prediction!!!!
# Hypothesis : le resultas inprécis suit une loi alétoire. Donc nous pouvons alors considérer que les cas précis

temp = temp[temp['is_reliable'] == True]


dic ={'zh-Latn' : 'zh',
      'ja-Latn' : 'ja',
      'ru-Latn' :'ru',
      'bg-Latn' :'bg',
      'el-Latn' : 'el',
      'hi-Latn'	: 'hi'

      }

temp['language'].replace(dic, regex=True, inplace=True)
df_language = temp['language'].value_counts().reset_index()
print('number of language :', len(set(temp['language'])))

pareto_plot(df_language, 'index','language')
## only 9% of languages ​​capture 70% of titles sold

df_all= df_language.sort_values(by='language',ascending=False)
df_all['cumul']=df_all['language'].cumsum()


threshold70 = df_all["language"].sum() * 0.70
df_Per70 = df_all[df_all['cumul'] <= threshold70]

df_Per70['language'] = round(df_all['language']/ df_all['language'].sum()*100, 2)

df_Per70 = df_Per70.rename(columns = {'language' : 'percentage en %', 'index' : 'language'})
df_Per70 =df_Per70.drop(columns='cumul')
df_Per70

source:
temp = pd.DataFrame([cld3.get_language(i) for i in baseline['title']])

# select those that we're sure about the prediction!!!!
# Hypothesis : le resultas inprécis suit une loi alétoire. Donc nous pouvons alors considérer que les cas précis

temp = temp[temp['is_reliable'] == True]


dic ={'zh-Latn' : 'zh',
      'ja-Latn' : 'ja',
      'ru-Latn' :'ru',
      'bg-Latn' :'bg',
      'el-Latn' : 'el',
      'hi-Latn'	: 'hi'

      }

temp['language'].replace(dic, regex=True, inplace=True)
df_language = temp['language'].value_counts().reset_index()
print('number of language :', len(set(temp['language'])))

pareto_plot(df_language, 'index','language')

df_all= df_language.sort_values(by='language',ascending=False)
df_all['cumul']=df_all['language'].cumsum()


threshold70 = df_all["language"].sum() * 0.70
df_Per70 = df_all[df_all['cumul'] <= threshold70]

df_Per70['language'] = round(df_all['language']/ df_all['language'].sum()*100, 2)

df_Per70 = df_Per70.rename(columns = {'language' : 'percentage en %', 'index' : 'language'})
df_Per70 =df_Per70.drop(columns='cumul')
df_Per70
